milestones: American actor Patrick Swayze dies at age 57
6.4 magnitude earthquake hits Indonesia

wiki.text:
{{Infobox given name
| name =Demi
|image= |imagesize= |caption=
| pronunciation = Dem-EEE gender =Female meaning = Half of something region =
| Born =August 20th, 1992 origin =Latin related names =Demetria, Demetrios,
| Demetrius footnotes =
}} 'Demi' is the French translation meaning half. For example, demi frere which
means half brother or demi soeur which means half sister. Demi-glace is made by
simmering and reducing by half a mixture of half brown stock and half espagnole
sauce. Demi also has latin roots as feminine given name, originally a nickname
form of Demetria, the feminine form of the masculine name Demetrius, which is
itself the Latin and English spelling of Demetrios. Demi is uncommon as a
surname. People with the name Demi include:
* Demi Moore (b. 1962), American actress
* Demi Lovato (b. 1992), American actress and singer-songwriter.
* Demi Delia (b. 1967), Adult actress
* Demi (author) (b. 1942), American children's book author
* Demy (b. 1991), Greek singer
wiki.title: demi
